5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='TypeName'>
            <property name='id' value='TypeName'/>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='MethodName'>
            <property name='id' value='MethodName'/>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='ParameterName'>
            <property name='id' value='ParameterName'/>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='LocalVariableName'>
            <property name='id' value='LocalVariableName'/>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='PackageName'>
            <property name='id' value='PackageName'/>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-z0-9]*(\\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$'/>
        </module>"
    ]
}

{

            <property name='severity' value='warning'/>

        "<module name='ClassTypeParameterName'>

            <property name='severity' value='warning'/>

{

}

            <property name='allowConstructorNames' value='false'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='ParameterName'>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='LocalVariableName'>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>

}

  <property name='id' value='block_tags_order'/>
  <property name='param' value='@param'/>
  <property name='return' value='@return'/>
  <property name='throws' value='@throws'/>
  <property name='deprecated' value='@deprecated'/>
</module>"
    ]
}
7.2 The summary fragment:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='SummaryJavadoc'>
            <property name='id' value='SummaryJavadoc'/>
            <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF'/>
            <property name='severity' value='warning'/>
            <property name='forbiddenSummaryFragments' value='A{@codeFoo}isa..., Thismethodreturns..., Savetherecord.'/>
        </module>"
    ]
}
7.3 Where Javadoc is used:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='JavadocPackage'>
  <property name='id' value='JavadocPackage'/>
  <property name='scope' value='public'/>
  <property name='allowedJavadocTags' value='@author, @version, @since, @param, @return, @throws, @see, @serial, @serialField, @serialData, @deprecated'/>
</module>",
        "<module name='JavadocType'>
  <property name='id' value='JavadocType'/>
  <property name='scope' value='public'/>
  <property name='allowedJavadocTags' value='@author, @version, @since, @serial, @serialField, @serialData, @deprecated'/>
</module>",
        "<module name='JavadocMethod'>
  <property name='id' value='JavadocMethod'/>
  <property name='scope' value='public'/>
  <property name='allowedJavadocTags' value='@param, @return, @throws, @deprecated'/>
</module>"
    ]
}
7.3.1 Exception: self-explanatory member:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='JavadocMethod'>",
        "  <property name='id' value='JavadocMethod'/>",
        "  <property name='scope' value='public'/>",
        "  <property name='allowMissingJavadoc' value='false'/>",
        "</module>",
        "<module name='JavadocVariable'>",
        "  <property name='id' value='JavadocVariable'/>",
        "  <property name='scope' value='public'/>",
        "  <property name='allowMissingJavadoc' value='false'/>",
        "</module>"
    ]
}

        "</module>",

        "</module>"
    ]

4.8.5.5 Parameter and local variable ann:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='ParameterName'>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
            <property name='allowOneWordNames' value='true'/>
        </module>",
        "<module name='LocalVariableName'>
            <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
            <property name='allowOneWordNames' value='true'/>
        </module>"
    ]
}
4.8.2.2 Declared when needed:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": [
        "<module name='FinalLocalVariable'>
  <property name='id' value='FinalLocalVariable'/>
  <property name='tokens' value='VARIABLE_DEF'/>
  <property name='option' value='ignoreFinal'/>
</module>",
        "<module name='VariableDeclarationUsageDistance'>
  <property name='id' value='VariableDeclarationUsageDistance'/>
  <property name='maxDistance' value='5'/>
</module>"
    ]
}

</module>",

</module>"
    ]
